title: Did Clarence's wife, Thomas Jenny, sponsor 80 buses to the Capitol Games?
subtitle: The wife of the Supreme Court judge has been a vocal activist in marginal right-wing cases for more than a decade.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Virginia "Jenny" Thomas, wife of Supreme Court Judge Clarence Thomas, sponsored 80 buses to transport participants in the "Save America" rally on January 6, 2021.
